page.title: 08LUTTERWORTH SQUASH CLUB
page.content: Lutterworth Squash Club has been running for 7 years and is one of the town's most{popular clubs.}There are over 400 members, enrolled in the 5 different types of membership - Full Senior, Husband and Wife, Junior, Daytime, Social. There are{6 TEAMS},all playing in the Leicestershire League. There are 4 men's, 1 woman's and 1 junior teams, with 5 people in each team.The Club is open every day from 8.45 a.m. to 12 p.m.. Courts are in demand on Saturday and Sunday and most evenings. There are{4 courts}one being a glass court. You have to book a court up to 2 weeks in advance. The club has 6{Tournaments}and the National Veterans Final has been held at the club. One player quoted "I play because it is fast, hard and exciting".
